author: James Tanner
method: Heat a griddle pan until smoking. Add the slices of bread and grill on one side until golden. Place the remaining ingredients into a mini food processor and blend until smooth. Spread the un-toasted sides of the bread with the prawn mixture and then place prawn side down back onto the griddle pan to grill for three minutes or until cooked through.
ingredients: 2 slices French bread, cut on the diagonal,  2 raw tiger prawns, peeled and de-veined,  1 spring onion, finely chopped,  ½ red chilli, finely chopped,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander,  ½ tsp toasted sesame oil
